Stellar Debris.name: Stellar Debris
Stellar Debris.fullText:
Master of the Starry Night Attack 11Stellar Debris

Brilliant stellar debris explodes outward from you, burning your enemies.

Encounter        Arcane, Fire, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Close blast 5

Target: Each creature in the blast

Attack: Constitution or Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 1d8 + Constitution modifier or Charisma modifier radiant and fire damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target treats all creatures as having concealment.


Update (8/17/2012)
Changed in July 2012 rules update.

Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 93.
Stellar Debris.flavor: Brilliant stellar debris explodes outward from you, burning your enemies.
Stellar Debris.onHit: 1d8 + Constitution modifier or Charisma modifier radiant and fire damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target treats all creatures as having concealment.

Minor Gift of Foresight.name: Minor Gift of Foresight
Minor Gift of Foresight.fullText:
Master of the Starry Night Utility 12Minor Gift of Foresight

You can see the doom of your enemies, and that foresight lets you benefit from your boon.

Encounter        Arcane
Free Action      Personal

Effect: You remove any number of Warlock’s Curses you have placed on your enemies and gain the benefit of your pact boon as if each of those creatures had been reduced to 0 hit points.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 93.
Minor Gift of Foresight.flavor: You can see the doom of your enemies, and that foresight lets you benefit from your boon.
Minor Gift of Foresight.effect: You remove any number of Warlock’s Curses you have placed on your enemies and gain the benefit of your pact boon as if each of those creatures had been reduced to 0 hit points.

Shooting Star.name: Shooting Star
Shooting Star.fullText:
Master of the Starry Night Attack 20Shooting Star

You release a starlike spear of light that impales your enemy and enables you to further afflict it with every successful attack you make.

Daily        Arcane, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Ranged 20

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution or Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 4d10 + Constitution modifier or Charisma modifier radiant damage. Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target, it takes 2d6 extra radiant damage.

Miss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever you hit the target, it takes 2d6 extra radiant damage.


Update (8/17/2012)
Changed in July 2012 rules update.

Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 93.
Shooting Star.flavor: You release a starlike spear of light that impales your enemy and enables you to further afflict it with every successful attack you make.
Shooting Star.onHit: 4d10 + Constitution modifier or Charisma modifier radiant damage. Until the end of the encounter, whenever you hit the target, it takes 2d6 extra radiant damage.
Shooting Star.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, whenever you hit the target, it takes 2d6 extra radiant damage.
